targets.expr:
(
  sum by(job, rule_group) (prometheus_rule_group_last_duration_seconds{job=~"$job"})
  >
  sum by(job, rule_group) (prometheus_rule_group_interval_seconds{job=~"$job"})
)

panels.description: Shows rate of alerts that successfully sent to alert manager.
panels.title: Sent Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of sent alerts.
panels.title: Sent Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to send alerts to alert manager.
panels.title: Sent Duration

panels.description: Shows ratio of dropped alerts compared to the total number of queued alerts.
panels.title: Drop Ratio

panels.description: Shows rate of handled Unary gRPC requests.
panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests.

targets.expr: sum by (job, grpc_code) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{grpc_code=~"Unknown|ResourceExhausted|Internal|Unavailable|DataLoss",job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval])) / ignoring (grpc_code) group_left() sum by (job) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests, in quantiles.
panels.title: Duration

panels.description: Shows rate of handled Streamed gRPC requests.
panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests.

targets.expr: sum by (job, grpc_code) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{grpc_code=~"Unknown|ResourceExhausted|Internal|Unavailable|DataLoss",job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval])) / ignoring (grpc_code) group_left() sum by (job) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests, in quantiles
panels.title: Duration
